title: National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI)
description: This database provides information from the National Climatic Data Center, part of the U.S. Department of Commerce. Included are climatic data from major airport weather stations, precipitation data, storm data, and Monthly Climatic Data for the World.

title: US EPA - Land, Waste, and Cleanup
description: Resources relating to production and treatement of waste in the United States.

category: Soil, Vegetation, and Land Use Data
title: FAOSTAT (UN FAO)
description: FAOSTAT provides free access to food and agriculture data for over 245 countries and territories and covers all FAO regional groupings from 1961 to the most recent year available.

title: Land Cover - US GAP Analysis Program
US GAP Analysis - Protected Areas Database
description: PAD-US is America's official national inventory of U.S. terrestrial and marine protected areas that are dedicated to the preservation of biological diversity and to other natural, recreation and cultural uses, managed for these purposes through legal or other effective means. PAD-US also includes the best available aggregation of federal land and marine areas provided directly by managing agencies, coordinated through the Federal Geographic Data Committee Federal Lands Working Group.

title: Earth Institute - Socioeconomic Datasets
description: Data provided by NASA's Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC) enable users to identify critical relationships between humans and the environment. Explore the datasets and tools that you can use to transform Earth observations to actionable science.

title: Idaho Population Data Tables (US Census Bureau)
Waste Management in Idaho (Dept. of Env. Quality)

title: NASA - Biosphere Datasets
description: Biosphere collections data include: vegetation condition and type, biomass measurements, habitat structure, and evaporative stress. Also includes environmental vairables such as temperature, precipitation, human impacts, thermal anomaly, and aquatic data.

category: Soil, Vegetation, and Land Use Data
title: NASA - Soils Datasets
description: The ORNL DAAC Soil Collections archive contains data on the physical and chemical properties of soils, including: soil carbon and nitrogen, soil water-holding capacity, soil respiration, soil texture.

description: Datasets available include the National Biomass and Carbon Dataset 2000 (NBCD) and the Large-Scale Biosphere-Atmosphere Experiment (LBA).
